name: Speedrun Jumper
description:
Speedrun Jumper

is a simple game in early access. Here is only 1 demo level, in future i'll do more levels. 
It can have some bugs or errors.
If you have any problem with buttons just press mouse button and press Enter;
If you want to use commands, press " ` ".

List of commands:

goto (0-3) - Teleport to checkpoint
quit - Quit from game

If you like this game and want to elaborate this game, just comment it.

Stages: First Stage. Parkour Second Stage. Maze

Here you have to find a key to open the door.

Stage 3. Stage with ball Controls:

W; A; S; D - Move
Space - Jump
Enter - Confirm
Left shift - Sprint
` - Commands
Esc - Pause/Cancel

There's no soundtracks.
